sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-checkbox-group :disabled="isDisabled" @change="doChange" v-model="checkBoxValue">
    <el-checkbox :label="item.code" v-for="item in options">{{ item.codename }}</el-checkbox>
  </el-checkbox-group>
</template>

<script>

  import {mapGetters} from 'vuex'

  export default {
    name: 'Checkbox',
    props: {
      codetype: {
        type: String,
        required: true
      },
      secondLevel: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false,
        default: false
      },
      filter: {
        type: String,
        required: false
      },
      disabled: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false
      },
      value: {
        type: Array
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      this.buildSelectOptions()
      this.checkBoxValue = this.value
      if (this.disabled) {
        this.isDisabled = this.disabled
      }
    },
    methods: {
      buildSelectOptions() {
        if (!this.secondLevel) {
          this.options = this.ldcodes[this.codetype]
          if (this.filter) {
            this.options = this.filterOptions(this.filter, this.options)
          }
        } else {
          if (this.filter) {
            let secondKey = this.codetype + "." + this.filter
            this.options = this.ldcodes[secondKey]
          }
        }
      },
      doChange(val) {
        this.$emit('change', val)
      }

    },
    data() {
      return {
        options: [],
        checkBoxValue: [],
        isDisabled: false
      }
    },
    watch: {
      value(val, oldVal) {
        this.checkBoxValue = val
      },
      checkBoxValue(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.$emit('input', this.checkBoxValue)
        }
      },
      disabled(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.isDisabled = val
        }
      }, filter(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.checkBoxValue = []
          this.buildSelectOptions()
        }
      }

    },
    computed: {
      ...mapGetters([
        'ldcodes'
      ])
    }
  }
</script>


<style>

</style>
